ud5.3:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud5.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosi—
ud5.3:1.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
ud5.3:2.1: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī taṃ mahājanakāyaṃ dūratova sannipatitaṃ.
ud5.3:2.3: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhājīyati.
ud5.3:2.5: Appeva nāmettha kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā labheyyan”ti.
ud5.3:3.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī yena so mahājanakāyo tenupasaṅkami.
ud5.3:3.2: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ.
ud5.3:3.4: “na kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhājīyati.
ud5.3:3.5: Samaṇo ayaṃ gotamo parisati dhammaṃ deseti.
ud5.3:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā sabbāvantaṃ parisaṃ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi “ko nu kho idha bhabbo dhammaṃ viññātun”ti?
ud5.3:4.2: Addasā kho bhagavā suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinnaṃ.
ud5.3:4.5: Suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ ārabbha anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
ud5.3:4.9: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā taṃ pakāsesi—
ud5.3:4.11: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
ud5.3:4.12: evamevaṃ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
ud5.3:5.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthu sāsane uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud5.3:5.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud5.3:6.2: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
ud5.3:6.5: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
ud5.3:6.6: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
ud5.3:7.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
ud5.3:7.2: Atha kho acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi.
ud5.3:8.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
ud5.3:8.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
ud5.3:8.3: “yo so, bhante, suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito, so kālaṅkato.
ud5.3:9.4: Suppabuddho, bhikkhave, kuṭṭhī tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
ud5.3:10.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud5.3:10.2: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena suppabuddho kuṭṭhī ahosi—
ud5.3:11.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kuṭṭhī imasmiṃyeva rājagahe seṭṭhiputto ahosi.
ud5.3:11.2: So uyyānabhūmiṃ niyyanto addasa tagarasikhiṃ paccekabuddhaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ.
ud5.3:11.6: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccittha.
ud5.3:11.7: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imasmiṃyeva rājagahe kuṭṭhī ahosi manussadaliddo, manussakapaṇo, manussavarāko.
ud5.3:11.8: So tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ āgamma saddhaṃ samādiyi sīlaṃ samādiyi sutaṃ samādiyi cāgaṃ samādiyi paññaṃ samādiyi.
ud5.3:11.9: So tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ āgamma saddhaṃ samādiyitvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā sutaṃ samādiyitvā cāgaṃ samādiyitvā paññaṃ samādiyitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapanno devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ.
ud5.3:11.10: So tattha aññe deve atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā cā”ti.
ud5.3:12.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
